name: Ideation
description: Working with you to envision software solutions to problems.

name: Cloud migration
description: GoDragons can modernise your organisation by taking on-premise systems and migrating them to the cloud. This improves reliability, availability and reduces cost.

name: Prototyping
description: Building the wrong thing is expensive. Creating a prototype to validate assumptions is a fast and cost-effective strategy.

name: Software development
description: Build web and native apps, backend systems and entire platforms.

name: Testing and reliability
description: Find peace of mind when making changes to your complex systems with our automated test suites protecting critical functionality.

name: System design
description: If a picture is worth a thousand words, then a cloud-based systems architecture diagram is worth a million.
